advancements.husbandry.bumblebee_rider.d: It's not the destination, it's the journBee! Ride a Bumble Bee.

advancements.husbandry.convert_egg.title: Good thing it can't hatch
advancements.husbandry.dragon_egg_hive.t: A Special Home for a Special Bee
advancements.husbandry.expansion_box.des: Get an expansion box for your advanced beehive
advancements.husbandry.feeding_slab.desc: Craft a Feeding Slab. You can put multiple flowering blocks in the Feeding Slab for your bees to have a centralized flowering spot.
advancements.husbandry.feeding_slab.titl: I want that one and that one and that one.
advancements.husbandry.fishy_bees.title: Fishy Bees-ness
advancements.husbandry.honeylogged.descr: Place honey fluid on the Feeding Slab.
advancements.husbandry.honeylogged.title: Double Whammy!
advancements.husbandry.overworld_nest.de: Pick up or craft a solitary nest.
Breed a Rancher Bee, Farmer Bee, Lumber Bee or Quarry Bee.
advancements.husbandry.quartz_nest.descr: Craft or pick up a Nether Quartz nest.
advancements.husbandry.quartz_nest.title: Wild wild bees.
advancements.husbandry.treat_on_nest.des: Use a Honey Treat on a nest.
advancements.husbandry.treat_on_stick.de: Craft a Treat on a Stick to steer your new favorite ride.
productivebees.hive.tooltip.nest_inactiv: Nest will no longer attract cuckoo bees. Craft with itself to reset counter.
productivebees.information.cage_release: Sneak while releasing the bee to reset it's hive position
productivebees.information.jar.fill_tip: Put a BeeCage containing the bee you want displayed inside using a hopper or a pipe.
productivebees.information.nestlocator.c: Will locate nests of type %s. Right click to search the nearby area.
productivebees.information.nestlocator.u: Not tuned. Shift right click on a block of the same type as the nest you are looking for.
productivebees.information.upgrade.upgra: Prevents bees living in this hive from teleporting.
Slowly extracts genes from visiting bees totally not hurting them in the process.

When installed in a hive it gives a %s%% chance for a new baby bee to be spawned from the hive every time honey is delivered.
The type of bee is based on which bees are present in the hive.
Multiple upgrades can be installed for a greater chance.
When installed in a Catcher only baby bees will be caught.
Changes the produced output to blocks instead of chips for Lumber and Quarry bees.
To clear the filter, put it in the crafting grid.
Right click bees to add them to the filter.

Increase the production output of bees in this hive by %s%%.
Multiple upgrades can be installed for a greater increase.

Gives the machine more breathing space by increasing the operation area.
Multiple upgrades can be installed for a greater range increase.

Gives a %s%% decrease in time spent in the hive.
Can be installed in a centrifuge for faster processing.
Multiple upgrades can be installed for a greater time decrease.
productivebees.ingredient.description.ac: This nest will attract bees in any overworld biome.
productivebees.ingredient.description.as:
Prefers dirt, gravel and sand nests.

The bee can be found in sandy areas like deserts, beaches and savannas and occasionally in taigas
productivebees.ingredient.description.bi: This nest will attract bees in any overworld biome.
productivebees.ingredient.description.bl: Can be found living inside holes in trees.
productivebees.ingredient.description.bu: A big rideable bee found naturally in Plains. Saddle up and hold a Treat on a Stick to glide around. Right click to boost.
This nest will attract bees in any overworld biome.
productivebees.ingredient.description.ch: Prefers dirt, gravel and sand nests.
productivebees.ingredient.description.co: This nest will attract bees in any overworld biome.
If you leave your items on the ground, this bee will collect and store them in its hive.
productivebees.ingredient.description.cr:
Explodes! when angered
...might be the diet.

You should keep this one to itself.
productivebees.ingredient.description.cu: The pheromones secreted from this bee gets animals in the mood.
productivebees.ingredient.description.da: This nest will attract bees in any overworld biome.
productivebees.ingredient.description.dy: Brings home more flowery bits than just nectar.
productivebees.ingredient.description.dr: A special hive made for Draconic bees that allows the user to harvest the otherwise hard to obtain draconic combs. Draconic bees living in a Dragon Egg Hive operating in the End, do not need any flowering as they are absorbing Draconic essence from the air. While operating in any other location, the Draconic bees must have another pollination source.
productivebees.ingredient.description.en: This nest attracts bees native to the end. Nest must be placed in the end to attract bees.
productivebees.ingredient.description.fa: Harvests crops and leaves a mess. To keep your farm clean you might want to invest in a Hoarder bee.
productivebees.ingredient.description.gl: Attracts glowing bees in the nether. Nest must be placed in the nether to attract bees.
productivebees.ingredient.description.gr: Bees native to warm rivers and beaches are attracted to this nest. Nest must be placed in a river or beach biome to attract bees.
Can be found living inside holes in trees.
productivebees.ingredient.description.ho: If you leave your items on the ground, this bee will collect and store them in its hive. Can carry more than it's lesser cousin, the Collector Bee.
productivebees.ingredient.description.in: Looks cool, but something is missing. Try pouring some dragon stuff on it.
productivebees.ingredient.description.ju: This nest will attract bees in any overworld biome.
productivebees.ingredient.description.le: Can be found nesting in the ground.
productivebees.ingredient.description.lu: Has a healthy obsession with wood logs.
productivebees.ingredient.description.ma: Can be found nesting in reed and on occasion in the ground.
productivebees.ingredient.description.ne: This sneaky bee will lay its eggs in nests belonging to the Blue Banded Bee.
Attracts magmatic bees in the nether. Nest must be placed in the nether to attract bees.
Attracts crystalline bees in the nether. Nest must be placed in the nether to attract bees.
productivebees.ingredient.description.no: This sneaky bee will lay its eggs in nests belonging to the Ashy Mining Bee.
productivebees.ingredient.description.oa: This nest will attract bees in any overworld biome.
productivebees.ingredient.description.ob: Tough living environment only suitable for some bees native to the end.
productivebees.ingredient.description.pr: This bee is nowhere to be found on land. Fishermen tell tales of this bee nibbling on their bait when fishing in deep waters.
productivebees.ingredient.description.qu: Has a healthy obsession with stone, sand and gravel.
productivebees.ingredient.description.ra: In bee-school its nickname was BooBee.
productivebees.ingredient.description.re: Can be found nesting in reeds...
Lives in trees using resin to protect its eggs.
productivebees.ingredient.description.sa: Bees native to deserts are attracted to this nest.
productivebees.ingredient.description.se:
%s

This species of bees can't breed amongst themselves.
productivebees.ingredient.description.on: To acquire this bee, look up the crafting recipe for its spawn egg.
productivebees.ingredient.description.sk: Be sure to keep your hives well lit to prevent this guy from moving in.
productivebees.ingredient.description.su: This little warm and moist bee can bee found in tropical areas. It produces a special type of super delicious comb. It can find it's way into cocoa beans even when grown outside of their natural climate.
productivebees.ingredient.description.ru: You can still search for ruby.
productivebees.ingredient.description.sp: The combs of this bee can be centrifuged to get certus quartz seeds which require further processing.
productivebees.ingredient.description.sl: Attracts wild slimy bees. Nest must be placed in a swamp biome.
productivebees.ingredient.description.sn: Bees native to colder areas are attracted to this nest. Nest must be places in a cold biome to attract bees.
productivebees.ingredient.description.so: Attracts ghostly bees in the nether. Nest must be placed in the nether to attract bees.
productivebees.ingredient.description.sp: This nest will attract bees in any overworld biome.
productivebees.ingredient.description.st: Chips can be crafted into blocks in a 3x3 grid
This nest will attract bees in any overworld biome.
productivebees.ingredient.description.su: This nest will attract bees in any overworld biome.
productivebees.ingredient.description.wo: Chips can be crafted into blocks in a 3x3 grid
productivebees.ingredient.description.ye: Can be found living inside holes in trees.
productivebees.ingredient.description.zo: Be sure to keep your hives well lit to prevent this guy from moving in.
productivebees.nest_locator.found_hive: A nest was located %s meters that way!
productivebees.nest_locator.not_found_hi: No nests of the type %s could be found nearby.
productivebees.top.solitary.can_repopula: There are no bees in this location that will move into this nest.
The nest can attract bees in this location.
productivebees.top.solitary.repopulation:
Repopulation cooldown %s
Use additional treats to speed up
Nest is empty. Use a honey treat on it to attract a bee.
productivebees.information.selfbreed_dis: This bee species cannot breed amongst themselves
productivebees.information.bee_helmet.in: %s%% chance to spawn a KamikazBee when hit
productivebees.ingredient.description.oi: This bee is nowhere to be found on land. Go fishing in deep waters if you want this thicc oily apid.
productivebees.ingredient.description.sk: Be sure to keep your hives well lit to prevent this guy from moving in.
productivebees.ingredient.description.su: This little warm and moist bee can bee found in tropical areas. It produces a special type of super delicious comb. It can find it's way into cocoa beans even when grown outside of their natural climate.
productivebees.ingredient.description.sp: The combs of this bee can be centrifuged to get certus quartz seeds which require further processing.
productivebees.ingredient.description.zo: Be sure to keep your hives well lit to prevent this guy from moving in.
productivebees.ingredient.description.he: It pollinates from animals, I just haven't found a way to show that in JEI yet.
